PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: As a result of these merits , PSCs based on these previously reported side - chain D-A polymers exhibited a maximal PCE of 4.74% .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| maximal PCE |
| PSCs (Polymer Solar Cells) |
| side-chain D-A polymers |

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are "maximal PCE" (short for "maximum power conversion efficiency"), "PSCs" (short for "Polymer Solar Cells"), and "side-chain D-A polymers". These entities are mentioned as a result of the merits of certain polymers and their impact on the performance of solar cells.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| maximal PCE |

The only clear "Material Property" entity in the paragraph is "maximal PCE" (short for "maximum power conversion efficiency"). This is a property of a material that describes its efficiency in converting light into electrical energy. The other entities mentioned, "PSCs" (short for "Polymer Solar Cells") and "side-chain D-A polymers", are types of materials, not material properties.
